section:
If you have a ship docked at Smogmaw you can either put to sea or sail upriver. Alternatively you may be able to hire passage aboard a merchant ship. In either case you will need to go to the quayside. It is also possible to travel on from here on foot, of course, but you are warned that the hinterland consists of wild jungle and dangerous marshes.
Go to the quayside Travel overland Remain in Smogmaw
